channel.title: Global Expert in Mining Crushing and Electrical Control – Intelligent Substation

item.title: ZBW-12-intelligent-integrated-substation-European-style
item.description:
Product Overview

The box-type substation is a frame structure, which is welded with section steel; the shell is made of aluminum alloy plate, coated with special paint. There are four pull-out hanging bolts on both sides of the box-type substation base, and four lifting rope support cards on both sides of the top eaves of the box-type substation. This special design for hoisting greatly facilitates the safe hoisting of the substation and prevents the sling from scratching the casing, which is highly praised by users. The box substation is divided into relatively independent high and low voltage rooms and transformer rooms by steel plates. The low voltage room and transformer room can have corridors or not.

Performance characteristics：

  1. Adopting three cooling measures: upper and lower natural wind convection, horizontal natural wind convection and bottom special fan forced air cooling, the temperature rise has a large margin;

  2. Light weight, small size and high rigidity;

  3. Modularization: the high and low voltage electrical room, transformer room, metering box, and capacitor box are each formed into modules, which can be selected and combined according to user needs;

  4. Beautiful appearance, low noise, in harmony with the surrounding environment and increase the beauty;

  5. Powerful functions, complete facilities, high voltage can meet the ring network power supply, low voltage room can have 8 power outlets and 4 lighting outlets

  6. The high and low voltage operation corridor is 1 meter wide, and there are doors that open outwards on all sides, which is very convenient for operation and maintenance;

We welcome global agents, distributors, retailers, and other partners to join us and work together to develop mutually beneficial business relationships. Our products have already been well received by customers in many countries and regions, and we look forward to expanding our reach even further.

contact us: sales@senkuogroup.com

item.title: ZGS-12-intelligent-integrated-substation-American-style
item.description:
Product Overview

ZGS-12 intelligent integrated substation American box substation is also called prefabricated substation or prefabricated substation. It is a kind of high-voltage switchgear, distribution transformer and low-voltage power distribution device. It is a factory prefabricated indoor and outdoor compact power distribution equipment arranged according to a certain wiring scheme, which is to organically combine functions such as transformer step-down and low-voltage power distribution. Together, they are installed in a moisture-proof, rust-proof, dust-proof, rodent-proof, fire-proof, theft-proof, heat-insulating, fully enclosed, and movable steel structure box. It is suitable for urban network construction and transformation, and is a rising trend after civil substations. Brand new substation. The box-type substation is suitable for mines, factories, enterprises, oil and gas fields, and wind power stations. It replaces the original civil engineering power distribution room and power distribution station, and becomes a new type of complete power transformation and distribution device. The box-type substation is suitable for residential quarters, urban public substations, bustling downtown, construction power supply, etc. Users can choose box-type substations according to different conditions of use and load levels. Since the box type substation came out, it has developed extremely rapidly. In developed countries in Europe, it has accounted for 70% of distribution transformers, and in the United States it has accounted for 90%. With the rapid development of China’s urban modernization and the continuous renewal and transformation of urban distribution networks, it will be widely used.

Performance characteristics：

The product is small in size and beautiful in appearance. Easy installation, operation and maintenance, reliable operation. The transformer adopts a three-phase five-column structure, and the winding connection group adopts Dyn11 connection, which has the characteristics of low loss, low noise, zero-sequence voltage self-suppression, three-phase voltage mutual non-interference, good lightning protection performance, and strong unbalanced load capacity. . The high-voltage side uses plug-in dual-sensitive fuses and backup fuses to provide double protection for the transformer. The shell is made of high-quality steel plate, which has good corrosion resistance after special anti-corrosion process. Shell protection grade IP33.

We welcome global agents, distributors, retailers, and other partners to join us and work together to develop mutually beneficial business relationships. Our products have already been well received by customers in many countries and regions, and we look forward to expanding our reach even further.

contact us: sales@senkuogroup.com
